bike.description: This is a great starter bike… perfect for hotels, campuses, light and casual commutes around town, weekend rides. Customize Your Daisy! Single Speed/Coaster BrakeAlloy wheelset (silver)Saddle (brown, black)Schwalbe Tires (Black, Brown, or Cream)44t chainringTouring pedalsAlloy seatpost, stem, and headsetAlloy moustache barsCork Grips
